meanings.definition: The acorn-shaped tip of the penis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the glans is a sensitive part of the male body.
meanings.sent2: He winced in pain when he accidentally bumped his glans against the edge of the table.
meanings.sent3: The glans blushed when the nurse complimented its smooth texture.
meanings.sent4: His glans stood out like a beacon in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The glans, like a tiny acorn, is a crucial part of the male anatomy.

meanings.definition: A rounded mass at the end of a stalk, as in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The flower's glans swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the glans of the mushroom before picking it.
meanings.sent3: The glans of the plant seemed to nod in agreement with the gardener's plan.
meanings.sent4: The glans of the cactus looked like a miniature crown atop its spiky body.
meanings.sent5: The glans of the sunflower was heavy with seeds, ready to fall and grow anew.

meanings.definition: A structure resembling a gland in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The glans in the model of the cell was highlighted to show its importance.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the glans closely to understand its role in the body.
meanings.sent3: The glans of the machine seemed to regulate the flow of energy within it.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as a glans, releasing the necessary information at the right time.
meanings.sent5: The glans of the system controlled the distribution of resources efficiently.
